An **amulet versus stone** is a type of [amulet](/wiki/Amulet "Amulet") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It grants limited protection from [petrification](/wiki/Petrification "Petrification").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

- [2 Description](#Description)

  - [2.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [2.2 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

There is an amulet versus stone in [Grund's Stronghold](/wiki/Grund%27s_Stronghold "Grund's Stronghold"). This amulet is guaranteed to be generated in SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM; in Hack'EM, there is only a 1⁄3 chance of the amulet generating.

## Description

An amulet versus stone prevents stoning from ending your game, with the method depending on the variant.

### SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, the amulet works much like an [amulet of life saving](/wiki/Amulet_of_life_saving "Amulet of life saving"): If you are turned to stone while wearing the amulet, it will reanimate you and change in beatitude (i.e., blessed to uncursed or uncursed to cursed) rather than vanishing.

### Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, the amulet versus stone instead provides [stoning resistance](/wiki/Stoning_resistance "Stoning resistance") while worn, mirroring the secondary protection of wearing [yellow dragon-scaled armor](/wiki/Yellow_dragon_scales "Yellow dragon scales"). Putting on the amulet while oyu are turning to stone will abort the stoning process.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

## Strategy

In SLASH'EM and SlashTHEM, the same amulet versus stone can save your life multiple times due to how it functions, especially with a supply of [holy water](/wiki/Holy_water "Holy water") to uncurse or bless it. While generally inferior to an amulet of life saving, SLASH'EM's stronger stoning monsters make it a good item to have on hand if a [basilisk](/wiki/Basilisk "Basilisk") blocks off your escape route or an [asphynx](/wiki/Asphynx "Asphynx") attacks from under a [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest") you were trying to [loot](/wiki/Loot "Loot"). If you have another source of [reflection](/wiki/Reflection "Reflection") and [drain resistance](/wiki/Drain_resistance "Drain resistance") and have not found an amulet of life saving, the amulet versus stone is probably your next best guard against [YASD](/wiki/YASD "YASD").

In Hack'EM, wearing the amulet will protect you thoroughly from stoning, making it a viable option over an [amulet of reflection](/wiki/Amulet_of_reflection "Amulet of reflection") for dealing with boss monsters such as [Medusa](/wiki/Medusa "Medusa").

## References

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) <https://github.com/elunna/hackem/blob/a864feac9dbfbe68c02193a52c2c9fc071095db9/src/do_wear.c#L1516>
